name: Next.js Advanced Patterns
title: Next.js Advanced Patterns
description: Advanced Next.js 16 App Router patterns including parallel routes, intercepting routes, route groups, middleware patterns, ISR, on-demand revalidation, Server Actions, streaming, Edge Runtime, and tRPC integration

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: TypeScript and route conventions enable predictable behavior
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Streaming, loading states, and error boundaries serve user needs
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit route structure and metadata API clarify behavior
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Error boundaries and middleware prevent harmful outcomes
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified patterns across parallel routes, ISR, and Edge Runtime
